tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MediaConsumptionPatterns (
    user_id INT,
    media_type VARCHAR(50),
    media_title VARCHAR(100),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

"CREATE TABLE MediaConsumers (
  consumer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  consumer_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(100)
)"

"CREATE TABLE MediaChannels (
  channel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  channel_name VARCHAR(255),
  category VARCHAR(50),
  audience_size INT
)"

"CREATE TABLE ConsumptionLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  consumer_id INT,
  channel_id INT,
  view_duration_minutes INT,
  date_time TIMESTAMP
)"

"CREATE TABLE ViewerDemographics (
  consumer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  age_group VARCHAR(20),
  income_level VARCHAR(20),
  education_level VARCHAR(50),
  marital_status VARCHAR(20)
)"

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    registration_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE media_content (
    media_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    release_date DATE,
    duration INT,
    rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE user_ratings (
    user_id UUID,
    media_id UUID,
    rating FLOAT,
    rating_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, media_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (media_id) REFERENCES media_content(media_id)
)

CREATE TABLE media_views (
    view_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    media_id UUID,
    view_date TIMESTAMP,
    duration_watched INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (media_id) REFERENCES media_content(media_id)
)

CREATE TABLE media_interactions (
    interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    media_id UUID,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(20),
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (media_id) REFERENCES media_content(media_id)
)
